name: Record
description: The Record class is a container class for log and audit data that provides supportive information about the incident.  The source of this data will often be the output of monitoring tools.  These logs should substantiate the activity described in the document.

RecordData.name: RecordData
RecordData.description: Log or audit data generated by a particular type of sensor.  Separate instances of the RecordData class SHOULD be used for each sensor type.

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.description: This attribute has been defined in Section 3.2.
